snippet.title: LOCO-SORT ➡️ Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
🍂🍂🍂 STEAM AUTUMN SALE | NOV 27 – DEC 04 🍂🍂🍂
        🎁🎁🎁 LOCO-SORT is 60% OFF on STEAM 🎁🎁🎁
✅Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1740130/Loco-Sort/
✅Humble Bundle: https://www.humblebundle.com/store/locosort

ABOUT THE GAME:
Loco-Sort is a puzzle-solving indie game, set in the railroads of the 1880s America. You control a small locomotive with the goal of assembling a train by sorting several numbered railroad cars across a maze of rail tracks and switches. 30 challenging levels, 9 playable locomotives and much more!

PRESS KITS:
✅Loco-Sort: https://impress.games/press-kit/martins-14-games-unipessoal-lda/loco-sort
✅Martins 14 Games: https://impress.games/press-kit/martins-14-games-unipessoal-lda

QUICK REFERENCE GUIDE:
✅PDF: https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/1740130/manuals/Loco-Sort_Guide.pdf

PLEASE FOLLOW ME ON SOCIAL MEDIA:
✅Linktree: https://linktr.ee/martins14games
✅Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/martins14games/
✅Twitter/X: https://twitter.com/Martins14Games1
✅Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Martins-14-Games-Unipessoal-Lda-109015281450751
✅LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/martins-14-games-unipessoal-lda
✅indieDB: https://www.indiedb.com/games/loco-sort

SOUNDTRACK:
'Flat Rock' from the Loco-Sort Game Soundtrack | Song by Bennett Sullivan
✅Song on Artlist: https://artlist.io/song/64271/flat-rock
Martins 14 Games owns an Artlist Creative Pro License 

CHAPTERS:
0:00 Intro + Goals
0:33 Levels
0:48 Locomotives
1:06 Paint Jobs
1:14 Structures
1:29 Turntable
1:40 Final

© 2023 Loco-Sort is developed and published by Martins 14 Games, Unipessoal Lda. All rights reserved.
#locosort #gaming #train #railroad #locomotive #puzzle #trailer
